feed.title: Category: Phineas and Ferb | MECHAkunEX Media Diary

entry.title: Phineas and Ferb - Season 1 - Episode 3 - The Magnificent Few / S'Winter
entry.content: The Western themed one wasn't as good as the past ones, but the S'Winter one was pretty funny. Especially when Candace wins the Limbo.

entry.title: Phineas and Ferb - Season 1 - Episode 2 - The Fast and the Phineas / Lawn Gnome Beach Party of Terror
entry.content: I thought the memory of Doof's childhood as a lawn gnome was priceless.

entry.title: Phineas and Ferb - Season 1 - Episode 1 - Rollercoaster / Candace Loses Her Head
entry.content: These episodes are great. One of the memorable gags was Parry needing to go back to the house through the tubes... getting in traffic... and then having to go back. Also, the snakes part of the rollercoaster was crazy.
